item.description:
July’s FREE Community Evening of Guided Meditationsat Earthsong Yoga, our gift to you:

“Through the Eyes of Love”: Connecting to Deep Love – for Your Self and Others

  • Do you easily feel love for yourself?
  • Can you feel the love for you that's all around you?

Come join us to experience pure love inside and out, and all around! Don’t worry; we’ll make it easy!

I'll guide you through three meditations (with some instruction and discussion, too): one bringing love into your body; one on seeing yourself through the eyes of love; and one called “Spirit’s Kisses”.

My intention is to connect you to your true, magnificent Self and all the love available to you. Sound good?  If so, join us, and invite your friends and family to join us, too!

From a past session:

“I’m leaving refreshed, optimistic, empowered, full of love and excited about bringing more spirit into everything I do. I’m sure that practicing the techniques I learned tonight will help me very much. Thank you!!!”

So treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!

Please plan on arriving around 7:20 to get settled.

Space is limited and these meditation sessions at Earthsong Yoga fill up quickly, so registration is required. Please be considerate, and if you sign up, please show up or let us know of your change in plans.

Hope you'll join us!

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner and trainer in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.


This public event is co-sponsored by Earthsong Yoga and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service and is being shared with you because of it's applicability to law of attraction.
item.how_to_find_us: 186 Main St. is the Corey building (old historical building), Earthsong Yoga sign is on sidewalk in front, studio is on second floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: “Through the Eyes of Love”: Connecting to Deep Love – for Your Self and Others
